${modID}:LuckRelic.NAME: Lucky Clover
${modID}:LuckRelic.FLAVOR: "When it comes to luck, make your own."
DESCRIPTIONS: % chance to receive double rewards from combat or chests, which increases by #b1% after each combat.

${modID}:CasinoCatalyst.NAME: Casino Catalyst
${modID}:CasinoCatalyst.FLAVOR: A mysterious catalyst containing enormous power. Stolen from the Casino.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
